main event: A US Navy veteran reported sighting an unidentified object flying at over 30,000 feet, estimated speed of 500-600 mph on May 12, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as very large and round, and was not a jet aircraft,The veteran reported sighting a similar unidentified object three times since,The sky was clear with no overcast during the sighting,No vapor trail was observed from the object, The sighting was reported to the ATIC by the veteran who called at different times.
